snippet: The new ad reservations, on top of a previous $1 million, come as Mr. Cruz finds himself under intense criticism from his rivals, including Donald J. Trump and Senator Marco Rubio of Florida.
abstract: The new ad reservations, on top of a previous $1 million, come as Mr. Cruz finds himself under intense criticism from his rivals, including Donald J. Trump and Senator Marco Rubio of Florida.

headline.main: Ted Cruz ‘Super PAC’ Invests Additional $2.5 Million in Advertising
